column2: we could have more free time. As a result
column3: we could do more of what we really wanted like club activities
column5: or playing with friends. In my case
column6: I go to tennis club after class until 5:00 pm and then I go to cram school until 8:00 pm. After this full day
column7: I arrive at my home around 8:40 pm to eat dinner and take a shower. At nearly 10:00 pm I start my homework. I have a lot of homework. As a result
column8: I go to bed late at night at nearly 1:00 am in the morning and I donÅft have the opportunity to sleep for a long period of time. It is not healthy.
